item.title: The Bayesian sampling in a canonical recurrent circuit with a diversity of inhibitory interneurons
item.description: Diverse inhibitory neurons in brain circuits enable faster Bayesian computation via Hamiltonian sampling.

item.title: The motion planning neural circuit in goal-directed navigation as Lie group operator search
item.description: Neural circuits for goal-directed navigation are modeled as Lie group operator searches, implemented by a two-layer feedforward circuit mimicking Drosophila’s navigation system.
